籤詩版本二:
Xa umoya ukhanyisa amakhandlela kunye nezithunzi ezigqagqeneyo esibhakabhakeni, ziba njengeentyatyambo esipilini xa umntu ephupha.
Ndidiniwe ndicengwa ngabantwana ukuba bandihoye ndazi njani ukuba bubuxoki nje?
詩意:
Le hexagram ifana nomoya olayita ikhandlela.
Udumo lobuxoki luyingozi kuyo yonke into.
解曰: Ubutyebi busezulwini. Ubuhlwempu sisiphelo. Akukho mfuneko yokufuna iingcebiso. Zonke zimiselwe kwangaphambili.
籤詩故事一:
◇Uhambo lweSithandathu lukaKong Ming oluphuma eQishan
Ngexesha loBukumkani obuThathu, iNtaba yaseQishan yawela iWei kunye neShu. U-Kong Ming waphuma ngokuphindaphindiweyo waya kwiNtaba yaseQishan ukuhlasela i-Wei kodwa akazange aphumelele.
Ngexesha lesithandathu waphuma waya Qishan, Kong Ming wabhala imiyalelo yakhe, kodwa akazange aphumelele ekugqibeleni. Ekugqibeleni, uZhuge Liang wasweleka ngenxa yokugula eWuzhangyuan eneminyaka engama-54 ngenxa yokusebenza kakhulu.
(Eli bali sisikweko esithi "ubulumko abulingani nekarma").
聖意: Thandaza ikhaya lakho, ulumke, funa ubutyebi nenzuzo, lumka kwezoshishino, wulumkele umtshato wakho, wulumkele umtshato wakho, ukhuseleke, ukhuseleke, ukhuseleke, ube nabantu, ulahlekelwe yimisundululu, wonakaliswe, ulahlekelwe yimfuyo. , ukulahleka, ukungabikho, izimangalo zikawonke-wonke, ukulahlekelwa yimali, ukufudukela kwelinye ilizwe, ukulondoloza, ukulahlekelwa yimpahla, ukugula, ukugula, ukuba netyala lenguqu enzulu eYinshan,
